Song.title: Beautiful Savior
Song.copyright: Words and music by Stuart Townend © 1998 Thankyou Music Used by permission. All rights reserved.

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [| Dm7 | Eb2 | F Bb/D | Eb Bb :|]
VERSE 1: [Dm7]All my [Eb2]days I will s[F]ing this [Bb/D]song of [Eb]glad[Bb]ness [Dm7]Give my [Eb2]praise to the F[F]ountain [Bb/D]of del[Eb]ights For [Cm7]in [Ebmaj7]my h[F]elplessness You [Eb]heard [Bb/D]my c[F]ry And [Cm7]waves [Ebmaj7]of [Dm7]mercy poured down on my [G/B]life [C]
VERSE 2: [Dm7]I will t[Eb2]rust in the c[F]ross of [Bb/D]my Red[Eb]eem[Bb]er [Dm7]I will [Eb2]sing of the b[F]lood that [Bb/D]never f[Eb]ails Of [Cm7]sins [Ebmaj7]forg[F]iven of [Eb]consc[Bb/D]ience cl[F]eansed Of [Cm7]death [Ebmaj7]def[Dm7]eated and life without [G/B]end [C]
CHORUS: [C/Bb]Beautiful [F/A]Saviour,[Bb] Wonderful [C]C[C/E]ounsel[F]or Clothed in [Gm]majesty, Lord of [Gm/F]history You’re the [C/E]Way, the [Dm7]Truth, the [C]Life [C/Bb]Star of the [F/A]Morning, [Bb] glorious in [C]h[C/E]olin[F]ess You’re the [Gm]Risen One, heaven’s [Gm/F]Champion And You [C/E]reign, [Dm7]You [C]reign [Eb2]over [F]all
VERSE 3: I [Dm7]long to [Eb2]be where the pr[F]aise is [Bb/D]never [Eb]end[Bb]ing [Dm7]Yearn to [Eb2]dwell where the gl[F]ory [Bb/D]never f[Eb]ades Where c[Cm7]ount[Ebmaj7]less w[F]orshipers will s[Eb]hare [Bb/D]one s[F]ong And [Cm7]cries [Ebmaj7]of “w[Dm7]orthy” will honor the L[G/B]amb [C]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 all my days i will sing this song of gladness give my praise to the fountain of delights for in my helplessness you heard my cry and waves of mercy poured down on my life verse 2 i will trust in the cross of my redeemer i will sing of the blood that never fails of sins forgiven of conscience cleansed of death defeated and life without end chorus beautiful saviour wonderful counselor clothed in majesty lord of history youre the way the truth the life star of the morning glorious in holiness youre the risen one heavens champion and you reign you reign over all verse 3 i long to be where the praise is never ending yearn to dwell where the glory never fades where countless worshipers will share one song and cries of worthy will honor the lamb
